tool_project_metadata.name: tool_build_docx_parser
tool_project_metadata.description: A comprehensive DOCX document parser that extracts metadata, splits content by sections, caches content locally, supports content retrieval by page number or section title, and processes embedded images with base64 encoding or file path options

tools_included.name: parse_document
tools_included.description: Parses a DOCX document and extracts metadata including page count, character count, section information, and images

tools_included.name: get_page_content
tools_included.description: Retrieves the content of a specific page from a previously parsed document

tools_included.name: get_section_content
tools_included.description: Retrieves all content from a specific section identified by its title

tools_included.name: get_image
tools_included.description: Retrieves a specific image from a parsed document with options for base64 or path return

tools_included.name: clean_cache
tools_included.description: Removes all cached files associated with a specific job

sections_included: Complete API documentation for all 5 functions
Detailed parameter and return value descriptions
Multiple usage examples including complete workflow

skill_details.description: Parse and extract content from Microsoft Word DOCX documents, including metadata, sections, pages, and images with structured caching for efficient retrieval

documentation_report.summary: Successfully generated complete documentation for the DOCX document parser tool, including tool configuration file (tool_config.json) with metadata for all 5 tool functions, comprehensive README.md with 11 major sections and 12 code examples, and skill.md document for Claude skill system with usage instructions and integration patterns. All documentation follows the specified formats and includes detailed API documentation, usage examples, error handling, and best practices. The tool is now fully documented and ready for deployment.
